Light - Interface in fast3d.complex.light
some surfaces can offer data to calculate an almost realistic shadow- or light- effects

lightColor - Variable in class fast3d.complex.light.AmbientLight

lighter(double) - Method in class fast3d.graphics.Color

LightInvalidationControl - Class in fast3d.simple.controls
accomplishes that the lighting-calculation for everything is done in every single frame if activated
LightInvalidationControl(Panel3d) - Constructor for class fast3d.simple.controls.LightInvalidationControl

line(Vector3d, Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.graphics.Graphics3d
shades the vertices and draws a line from one of these pixels to the other
works like drawing a 3d-line
Line - Class in fast3d.renderables
a line in 3d space with width of 1 pixel
lines disappear on mathematically correct ray-tracing imaging, because they have no actual width (like when using the DefaultFragmentShader)
Line(Vector3d, Vector3d, Color) - Constructor for class fast3d.renderables.Line
constructs a line from start to end with the color c
Line(Vector3d, Vector3d) - Constructor for class fast3d.renderables.Line
constructs a line from start to end with a white color

load(File) - Static method in class fast3d.util.serial.ObjFileLoader

load(String, BufferedReader) - Static method in class fast3d.util.serial.ObjFileLoader

lookInDirection(Vector3d, Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.complex.Group
rotates in the way that the new forward vector will be parallel to the parameter dir and the new up vector will be parallel to the parameter up
dir and up should be orthogonal
lookInDirection(Vector3d, Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.complex.Object
rotates in the way that the new forward vector will be parallel to the parameter dir and the new up vector will be parallel to the parameter up
dir and up should be orthogonal
lookInDirection(Vector3d, Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.complex.Scene
rotates in the way that the new forward vector will be parallel to the parameter dir and the new up vector will be parallel to the parameter up
dir and up should be orthogonal
lookInDirection(Vector3d, Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.math.Camera
the up-vector should be orthogonal to the direction-vector, otherwise the shading may be warped
lookInDirection(Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.renderables.Rectangle
aligns the direction as new normal
lookInDirection calculates a rotation, the rotation-axis will be the crossProduct of currentNormal and newNormal (== given direction)
lookInDirection(Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.renderables.Triangle
aligns the direction as new normal
lookInDirection calculates a rotation, the rotation-axis will be the crossProduct of currentNormal and newNormal (== given direction)
lookTo(Vector3d, Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.math.Camera
sets focus to the specified target with zoom=1d
means look in direction towards the target
lookTo(Vector3d, double, Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.math.Camera
sets focus to the specified target with zoom
means look in direction towards the target
a zoom-level under 0 means lookAway from target
